divs: sighting detailsi am now 66 years old. this happened when i was 6 or 7 years old at my aunt's home in cheviot, ohio. i have told this story to many people in my life and everyone has thought that i have made this up. a friend of mine told me about your network and so i am going to try again. i guess it is because my life is growing short that i want to make a real effort to tell my story. can't tell you the time of day really but it was around mid morning and i was visiting my aunt. her home at that time was in the country in cheviot, ohio. their garage\basement was built under there house which is where i was when this happened. i was playing with my aunt's music box. my back was to the garage door (which was open) when i felt like something was wrong. i turned toward the open door and there was a creature there looking at me. i don't know just how tall i was at that time but it seemed to be my size. it's head was larger than it's body with large eyes, small arms and what looked to be hands, stuped over slightly. the most strange part about this figure was that i could see it's veins. don't remember it's feet. i remember just standing there looking at this creature for the longest time and it me, (must have been just seconds) i did'nt feel frightened but i wanted my aunt to see this so i turned and ran up the basement stairs into the kitchen where my aunt was and by the time i conveniced her to go down to the garage the figure was gone. and ofcourse she told me not to go around telling people about what i thought i saw because it was just all in my head. until the day that i die i will remember this event and wonder just what that creature was thinking when we were just standing there looking at each other. i hope you believe me and if you do you will be the first.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cheviot
There were no other sightings in Cheviot on or around November 30th 1945
